sentences.en: An investigator needs a lot of encouragement; only then will he progress.
sentences.cn: 慕道友需要很多的鼓励才会进步.

sentences.en: Any medical investigator would accept the pattern already uncovered as evidence of falsification.
sentences.cn: 任何医务调查员都会把已经发现的这种情形当作伪造的证据.

sentences.en: Daniels and Franklin concurred in an investigator's suggestion that the police be commended.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔斯和富兰克林一致同意一位调查人员的建议，即警方应该受到赞扬。

sentences.en: Experience suggests that investigator might never find the exact cause.
sentences.cn: 经验告诉我们,调查人员也许永远找不到致病的原因.

sentences.en: Federal investigator left a skeleton crew to analyze the plane wreckage.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查员留下精干人员来分析飞机的残片.

sentences.en: Finally the Compliance division put its most experienced investigator, Robert Rice, on the case.
sentences.cn: 最后,调查处派最有经验的调查员罗伯特·赖斯来办理这一案件.

sentences.en: He was a special investigator for the FBI.
sentences.cn: 他是联邦调查局的特别调查员.

sentences.en: I got two calls in to the private investigator about his mother.
sentences.cn: 我有两个私家侦探的电话,是关于他母亲的.

sentences.en: Internal Affairs Investigator : There's no smoking in this building, detective.
sentences.cn: 内务调查员: 这里不准吸烟, 探员.

sentences.en: James Ironside is an investigator with the CJD Surveillance Unit in Edinburgh.
sentences.cn: 詹姆士?艾恩赛德是爱丁堡的“库贾氏症监测单位”的调查员.

sentences.en: Mark Westhusin , who was lead investigator on the project.
sentences.cn: 威斯土森博士说道,他是这一科研项目的领头人.

sentences.en: Photographer, investigator, bystanders should not appear in any scene photographs.
sentences.cn: 摄影师, 调查, 旁观者不应该出现在任何现场的照片.

sentences.en: She has been an investigator of the Italian Telethon Foundation since 1996.
sentences.cn: 从1996年起,卡他尼欧也是义大利电视马拉松基金会的研究员.

sentences.en: The investigator was able to deduce the crime and find the criminal.
sentences.cn: 调查者能够推出犯罪过程并锁定罪犯.

sentences.en: The investigator was able to uncover new facts about the case.
sentences.cn: 调查员发现了与案件有关的新线索.

words.tran_cn: 研究的；调查的；好调查的
调查的，审查的；研究的，好研究的
研究者；[法]调查者；侦查员

trans.tran_en: someone who investigates things, especially crimes
